title: Siberian Suns
subtitle: Here comes the snow...
fluff: With Task Force Gold and the early access playtests finally coming to a close- SpinyNA is excited to reveal our next campaign set in the snowy tundras of Siberia. Where relics of old animosities mix with the fire of modern conflict.

title: A Glimpse To The Future
subtitle: Some notes from SpinyNA studios on our sister title to Calamari- Calamari 2088.
fluff: While our focus is mainly on the modern day Calamari titles and DLC- we've been expirementing to fill a gap we've felt for a long time. Guardsman deploying planetside on 7.25.2026

title: Devblog 28
subtitle: Paradox Larping, maps, rebalancing, and the end of Task Force Gold.

title: Pre-Order Bonuses
subtitle: Early access to Task Force Gold, two new Contractors, and a few more goodies.
